Contents: Commandant, please allow me to remind you that each operation is accompanied by a variety of missions.
After completing the mission, you will receive a large number of supplies. Please make sure that you collect them in time.
This will help us acquire advanced equipment earlier, which will be useful in future operations.
Let us do so next.
Commandant, thanks to everyone's hard work, I can finally rejoin the fight!
Before that, please upgrade and tune me, then assign the battle position for me.
Commandant... I can't wait to fight alongside with everyone together.
Commandant. The Constructs have their own military ranks.
It not only symbolizes honor, but raising their ranks will also increase their performance.
Complete specific missions to promote a Construct.
I look forward to bringing honor to the team, Commandant.
Commandant, battles can be long and difficult. In return for your daily efforts...
Signing in will earn you supplies every day! They will help you in your journey.
The supply center has prepared a special weapon for you as your first sign-in reward.
Gray Raven will always be with you, Commandant!
Commandant, you should have your own mission board, right?
In addition to your main missions, there are daily missions that can be completed for that day.
Don't underestimate these mission rewards!
Now, let's take a look at the mission board.
Yahoo! Do you remember who I am?!
I knew you'd remember! I mean... when we first met.
It's okay if you forgot. You'll remember soon enough, because we're about to fight side by side!
The supply center has prepared R&D Tickets for you. Go to claim them!
As battles get more difficult, we need to ensure a steady flow of supplies.
Keep it up and complete your major missions.
This will ensure that we have enough resources as our enemies get tougher.
Let's strive for humanity together, Commandant.
Outside of main missions, you can also have your Constructs take part in training programs.
Training allows us to gain experience in simulation battles.
Please remember to schedule training sessions for us in the future.
A new support squad has arrived in the region, Commandant. They are eager to meet with you.
In addition to delivering supplies, they will also trade resources with you.
Let's try trading something with them.
Commandant, are you running into skill point shortage issues when trying to upgrade Construct skills?
Battle Exercises are a great way to get more skill points.
Try it out if you need them.
These cogs contain an important material used in our Construct frames.
A lot of cogs are required to extract enough materials to upgrade our frames.
Cogs can be found in many places, especially in Cogs Galore.
Commandant, our equipment are made from special materials.
Upgrading them requires the same special materials.
We can find these upgrade materials from Logistics Maintenance.
Commandant, equipment eventually reaches a point where they can no longer be upgraded.
Overclock materials are required to enhance them further.
This will allow you to enhance equipment to a higher level.
You can get Overclock materials from Military Hardware.
Commandant, do you remember the battles that you participated in?
You usually only get to see one side of the story.
Over time, however, records from other sources become available.
Essentially, you have the chance to observe what happened from another perspective.
So, let's trying replaying the past, shall we?
Once we're familiar with the tactics of a particular operation...
The risk of battling becomes greatly reduced. This enables the Auto Clear feature.
This allows us to complete familiar missions without the need of your command.
This way, you'll be able to focus your attention on more important missions.
High-rank Memories are important to improving the combative capabilities of a Construct.
The more difficult the Combat Supply mission, the higher the chance to get high-rank Memories.
Now, let's try more difficult missions to test the limits of the squad!
Greetings, Commandant of the Gray Raven squad!
Curious about me?
We all have our own personal files.
You may learn a thing or two about us Constructs when you look through them!
We meet again, Commandant of Gray Raven.
Have you noticed that you now have access to the Trial Zone?
The Trial Zone offers the opportunity to try out various prototype projects under development...
... or, depending on the perspective, practical tricks by the research team.
More and more Constructs have joined our team.
You can view your Construct roster and status on the Construct Army page.
Reach Construct development milestones to get special materials.
I'm sure you'll find them useful...
Here's a message for you, rookie.
There have been sightings of very powerful Corrupted.
You should not attempt to combat these powerful foes on your own.
Join a Co-op operation to prove your ability to work with others.
I have high expectations for you, Gray Raven.
Most operations often involve multiple squads.
You can request assistance from other squads before a battle.
Try issuing a call for Constructs from other squads.
Commandant, remember Mr. Hassen's tip?
The more you know, the more decisions you face.
As your relationship with Constructs improves, you will be able to access more of their personal files.
Let me give you some advice. As you learn more about their past...
Make sure you treasure your present and future with them.
Commandant, we have received a new coating from HQ.
Coatings are purely cosmetic and do not affect Construct performance.
Um... Commandant, would you like me to put on a new coating?
Let's do some bounty missions, Commandant!
Oh, right. I need to explain them to you.
Completing bounty missions will earn your team a lot of experience.
But more importantly, bounty hunting sounds real cool!
Commandant, the Dormitory is finally open!
This symbolizes that we are ready to take root on Earth for the long haul.
I'm looking forward to living in the dorms with everybody!
You can also modify and upgrade the Dormitory.
I'm sure you'll make it a great place!
Which would you prefer, competition or cooperation?
Whether for honor or for resources, everything in the War Zone is earned through competition.
Earn a high enough rank to access a new War Zone...
...Which will grant even better rewards.
This is the ultimate trial ground for Gray Raven. How far can you go?
Good. I was worried that you won't pick up the receiver.
I've been analyzing Gray Raven's battle logs.
It looks like those special enemies have been giving you a hard time.
I'm giving you permission to use the training facilities to simulate training against these special enemies.
Get used to fighting them quickly, because enemies will only get tougher.
Are you as curious about this world as I am, Commandant of Gray Raven?
I long to return to Earth as much as you do, even though I was not born there.
There are so many secrets waiting to be discovered in the wastelands...
If you're interested, I can tell you about some... special places that we've found.
Greetings, Commandant. You now have access to the Medal system.
Medals are issued to those who have contributed to the cause of the United Human Front. You can find yours in the Central Database.
Thanks to your hard work, Babylonia is able to establish a foothold on the ground.
This is a new start for us, so here comes your next mission.
You're about to head to the "Reconstruction Zone" located near the safe zones.
Eliminate all the remaining enemies and restart the Central Purification Filters, so our Engineering Force can start their work.
I'll cover more detail after the Central Purification Filters are completed.
I want to talk to you about Gray Raven's recent performance.
Your recent performance has been exemplary, and you have earned the medal of Ace Commandant.
With achievement also comes expectation. I look forward to your next victory.
I've sent you the certification link. Go ahead and claim your medal!
It has been a long time since I've seen so many dots on the monitor. These dots represent the bases of humanity.
You've completed the mission successfully. And your contributions to Babylonia are well-noted.
I hereby issue you the Medal of Pioneers in recognition of your achievements. I look forward to your future endeavors!
Go, claim this medal of glory now.
Hmph, you are full of surprises.
It's been a long time since I last saw a commandant reach 1 million Progress. You were only a little slower than my performance when I was young.
You should be proud of it. It's an exclusive club of two.
You are now authorized for the medal. Claim it now!
This is the 9th liberation report from you. It seemed like an eternity ago that you and your team fought in your first battle...
You and your Constructs have grown into a true team, a bright beacon in the darkness. Your companions also indicate your strength.
Here is the Medal of Light Tower in honor of your achievements as the guiding light of humanity.
Now share the joy with your comrades!
I've seen you overcome many challenges in your path.
The path of leadership that you walk brings back many memories.
On behalf of the United Humanity Front, I hereby issue to you the Medal of Human Leader.
From now on, your duty is not to earn the approval of others, but to bring them hope and point them towards the future. See you on the bridge.
Congratulations on the capture of City 015, Commandant. The Engineering Force is already on its way to repair the city's Central Purification Filter.
Be careful, however, as there are still pockets of Corrupted on the outskirts.
A small step for your team, a great step towards victory over the Punishing Virus.
Gray Raven's efforts have led to the full retreat of the Ascendant from this city, as well as the establishment of our first major base on Earth. I look forward to your future performance.
You have not only recaptured a base for humanity, but also preserved the artifacts of the museum. Good job.
The Archaeological Team sends their regards. We'll make sure that you're rewarded!
Good job completing your mission in the harsh environment of the desert.
We've struggled to make headways in this region for a long time, now, we've finally established a foothold here thanks to you. The work of Babylonia can finally be carried out smoothly.
The data that you obtained from the test area are of great... historical importance to the development of M.I.N.D. technology.
I thank you on behalf of the education center under the Science Council.
I'm sure you understand that details regarding the Luna City Arsenal are classified.
That's why we're not in a position to hold a public award ceremony for you.
Still, you should know that we appreciate your work.
The murals... Sagemachina... interesting.
Your capture of these ruins allows us to investigate them up close. Good job.
Taking back the space station means a lot to the security of the surroundings of Babylonia in future.
On behalf of Babylonia, I would like to thank you for your outstanding contribution. I look forward to your return.
Looks like it went well.
I knew you could do it.
By the way, have you considered our offer? Akdilek would be pleased to have you join us, anytime.
Many thanks for your assistance.
The problems here are mostly resolved. The ship will now sail to the right direction.
But nobody knows what awaits us at the destination...
Whatever. It was you who brought us the opportunity to change. Thanks!
Good to see you back.
Humans suffered quite a loss this time, but it's okay. Because I still see hope in your eyes.
Alright, we still have lots to do, but you should take a good rest now.
There's someone waiting for you, don't forget.
Thanks for spending time with them.
We've been able to enjoy the holidays thanks to you.
Have a good rest. I've prepared a little gift for you back at HQ. Check it out later!
I've never been part of an event like this... It feels a little strange.
But I enjoy seeing the smile on everybody's faces.
Here's a little gift. I hope you like it.
Hey, Commandant, guess what I have for you?
It's my special New Year present!
Wait, where did it go? I thought I put it in my bag...
Did I already send it out? Let's go take a look!
Happy New Year, Commandant.
Thank you for all that you've done this past year.
May the next year be just as productive.
Commandant, Commandant! Happy New Year!
Miss me already?
Guess what, Nanami's got a New Year present for you!
Happy? Like it? This is the part where you praise Nanami!
It was quite a surprise when you asked me to come over for Spring Festival.
But I really enjoyed it!
Here's a little something in return.
Keep it a secret between us, ok?
I'm definitely not saying that I enjoyed Spring Festival with you guys!
I'm just saying that if you're gonna have a party, you need fireworks!
Luckily for you, I've got them prepared.
And since it's boring to watch fireworks by myself, I'll let you watch them together with me.
Alright, the regular update is complete. Everyone is dismissed. Commandant, please stay for a moment.
So let's get down to business on Camu.
As you may already know, Camu's body and mind are very special, and he is more suitable to fight in areas with high concentration of Punishing Virus.
According to preliminary research by the Science Council, Camu is able to perform missions in areas inaccessible to ordinary constructs.
I hope you can continue to connect with him remotely when fighting in high concentration areas—take care of him.
I've already uploaded today's battle data analysis report onto the system. Once we've collected enough data, I'll hand in a Construct refinement report to the Council.

Upgrading a Construct's frame needs to be done with extreme caution. The process requires constant optimization and fine-tuning. It's not something that can be done in a day, but the wait is worthwhile.
This is the end of today's report... By the way, I found out that today is a celebration in the west back in the Golden Age where... people gave gifts to those dear to them.
Don't get me wrong, I just think that celebrations are a core part of humanity, and for a certain someone to miss out on this important event would be... unfortunate.
Which is why, in order to make sure you don't miss out, I'll... always be here by your side, celebration or not. Happy Valentine's, KURONAME.
Commandant, today is a very important day in the Golden Age western culture, do you know what it is? It's the day of love!
Back in the Golden Age, people on Earth would give chocolates to the people they love, and the streets were filled with happy couples.
...I feel happy just thinking about it. I hope the world will be filled with love again once we reclaim Earth.
I wanted to experience it too, so I made some chocolates...
If it's not too much, will you accept these, Commandant?

Commandant! Happy Valentine's Day! I read that on Valentine's Day, you confessed your love. In the visual nov... I mean, the information I found! Valentine's Day is the day you spend with the most important person in your life!
And to me, that person is, of course, you, Commandant! Am I your most important person too, Commandant? I am, right? Right?
Hehe, anyway, I've prepared Valentine Serum chocolate for you! I've put tons of sugar in it. Nothing says Valentine's Day like it, right?
If you have time... could you come to my room tonight... I found a fighting game popular during the Golden Age! You're gonna love it! We can play it all night long!
Commandant, for all the times we've gone through, thank you for your leadership and guidance... Why did I say these things?
...According to the information of Golden Age festivals, today is the day where people expressed their feelings to their beloved with chocolate as a gift. Is it correct?
I see, so the information is true... You haven't misunderstood. Commandant is no doubt the one I like.
I've prepared hand-made chocolates for you. But I'm not... very familiar with this. I promise I will work harder on it, Commandant.
Happy Valentine's Day, Commandant.
Hey hey! It's Nanami! Commandant, do you know what day it is today?
Yep! It's Valentine's Day! Do you feel your heart is racing a bit faster?
Speaking of Valentine's Day, chocolate is the thing we definitely can't miss!

Ms. Celica said if there is a very very important person to you, you have to make a very very yummy chocolate as a present. So Nanami has spent a whole night... or two days... a long time anyway, to make this!
You have to enjoy it slowly! Nanami won't allow you to swallow it in only one bite!
I hope I didn't catch you at a bad time, Commandant of Gray Raven.
According to the database, today is a vital western festival during the Golden Age, Valentine's Day.
On this day, people used to make chocolates that contained their feelings and give it to the person who was important to them.
If you don't mind, please accept this. I don't know if you like sweets or not... but I hope you will like it.
...Happy White Day, KURONAME.
What? I couldn't care less about this boring festival.
But, well, since you look forward to that, I've prepared chocolates for you, just because I don't want to let you down.
Hmph, they're not exquisite, but I'm sure they will impress you!
Commandant! Happy Valentine's Day! On this day, what cannot be missed is chocolate!
Hehe... Look! Special chocolate made by me! The proportion of sugar, milk and cocoa is 1:2:4, which is a golden formula showed in Golden Age movies! Also I've used solidified serum jelly as stuffing!
By the way, this serum is slightly different. After all... we've shared some mutual secrets, right?
What? Have I tasted it before? How could I taste it before you do? It's a big gift to KURONAME!
BZZZZ—Can you hear me? The signal here's a bit unstable... What's with that face? You worried about me? As you can see, there's nothing to worry about. I'm fine.
This is for you, made with raw dark chocolate and Serum. I used to eat this kind of chocolate in the army all the time to refresh myself.
Yeah, I made it. What? It's not that hard to make chocolate... Why am I giving you chocolate? Do you really need me to explain?
Happy Valentine's Day. I'll be waiting for you outside Oasis later. You're worried about me, right? Then come see for yourself that I'm fine.
*WARNING! The communication channel has been hacked! Please disconnect it immediately!*
This is for you.
I'm sure you won't feel alone today as you have Gray Ravens by your side.
But still... Happy Valentine's Day.
Happy Children's Day, Commandant of Gray Raven.
Speaking of which, why do I still have to work today?! Am I not eligible? Don't you think I should have a day off?
Whatever, I've finished my work. How about I go have some fun at your dormitory? Don't tell President Hassen!
I'll go get some balloons and candies. See you later!
I found this flower during one of the missions. After looking up the database, I realized it was from the same taxonomical family as the one you gave me.
Seeing this flower... made me think of someone. Such coincidence was an extremely rare event, statistically.
To me, it was of significant value for research... I preserved it, so I could give it to the person it led me to.
According to the data from Golden Age, flowers had a language of their own. So... here's my reply to you.
Commandant, everybody told me to come here because I got a gift from you before. What did they mean by that?
Are you trying to tell me something? Sorry I can't hear you, you're stuttering quite a bit.
Just say it. I'll remember everything you say. Anything.
Commandant, I planted this rose myself...
Sorry that I never told you about this. I just wanted to give you a surprise today...
But I never thought that you would give me a flower first.
Thank you... I'm so happy.
Commandant, as a leader, you should manage your work-life balance.
Seeing your white rose reminded me of what other team members said about this day.
This is a day you'd want to spend with your dream partner...
I've brought you this rose in the hope that it would bring you my most sincere prayers and wishes.
Oooh? FOR ME?
Nanami's so glad! I hope you're as glad as I am!
Let Nanami see... Ahah, there it is!
Ta-da! Take it, Commandant! It's one of Nanami's best stuff!
Commandant, you copy? This is Kamui from an encrypted private channel. Make sure you listen to this! *Beep—*
Hey, Commandant, you busy? It's been a while since we last spoke!
It's White Day today! You sent me flowers, didn't you? I'm the only one to receive your gift of love, right?
I'm so happy! Commandant, I've got something for you too! See, I went to the park and picked the most beautiful rose there!
So, will you come and find me on White Day every year? It's a deal then! I'll always be waiting for you!
Pah, knew you'd be drowning in your reports in the office. Hey, you don't have anything else on, do you?
No? Good...
Why am I sitting on a sofa all of a sudden?
I sit where I want to sit!
By the way... You're free tonight, aren't you? Silence is compliance!
Morning, Commandant. How's work? I just... got your gift.
Such a gift on such a day... Are you trying to tell me something?
Well, in that case... Just remember to check your mailbox later.
If you like it, I'll take you to the sea of flowers the next time you come to Oasis.
Commandant, here's my gift for you in return. I'm not very good at this, so please forgive me if you don't like it...
But I will keep trying... To become your weapon that can cut through all the obstacles, and... to become the best Construct in your mind.
Commandant, you don't have to do this.
I love the flowers, but what I really want is...
To have you by my side.
I found this rose in some ruins during a mission long ago.
It was so beautiful. According to the database, on certain important dates, people in the Golden Age would give such flowers... to their important ones.
I recorded all its data, including the angle of every single petal, in my M.I.N.D. so I could restore it. It is the only rose I have stored in my M.I.N.D... And I hope you can see it too.
Commandant, thanks for your rose. I love it.
Actually... I have a little surprise for you too.
Can you come to the deck of Babylonia later?
Hey, Commandant, you busy? Mind if I spare some of your time?
I got your gift, so I was wondering if I should do something to return your favor. How about I give myself to you... Joking! Hehe.
Anyway, I've got a little surprise for you, and you only! Don't tell anyone else!
Make sure you take good care of it! I want to stay with you forever, just like this gift.
What? You should've expected me today when you gave me that last month.
So what's with this stupid outfit? You look miserably clueless!
Whatever, just give me your hand. Don't you know how to hold hands?
O-oi, don't grab me all of a sudden! Don't use so much force, you dumbo!
I'm back! It's a me! Na☆na☆mi!
Why didn't you tell Nanami earlier?! Do you know how difficult it is to take this out?
I had to return to the lab within 15 sec, then smash—I mean borrow the liquid nitrogen container, and rush back here!
Let me think... You shall have a one-day date with Nanami as punishment!
Waiting for me...? Guess not. Whatever.
I never thought you would care about such a date in Babylonia.
Honestly, that gift of yours wasn't very useful. In other words, I didn't like it.
If you are ever going to give me something again... Just pack yourself up and come to the Ascendant's base.
Commandant, it's been a while. How have you been?
I found a rose in an abandoned base while patrolling. I didn't know why, but you were the first thing that came to my M.I.N.D... So I brought it back in the hope that you would like it.
Then I saw your gift. You were thinking exactly what I was thinking, weren't you?
I have put your rose in a vase. Hope I can see you before it withers, if possible.
Happy White Day, Commandant! I didn't expect to get a gift from you.
Ah... What I mean is, I'm actually very happy.
Because it was the first time that I got such a valuable gift. Well, Commandant, are you ready for my "real gift"?
Thanks for your gift, Commandant.
By the way, "314 Days With You" just hits the theaters today. Let's watch it together.
And... There's something I want to tell you too.
So this is true...
This is for you.
I heard today was a day to exchange gifts with important ones.
I spent a lot of time preparing this.
Incoming communication from Strike Hawk—Chrome's dedicated channel.
Commandant of Gray Raven, please, allow me to call you by your name this time.
KURONAME, I have received your gift. I don't know if I understood your intentions correctly...
Speaking of roses, I wonder if you have ever heard of "Unter der Rose"—
I know this may not be allowed, but I want to be there with you.
Oh, you've already received the mission details, haven't you?
Codenamed "Operation Guardians", it's a regular patrolling mission that requires all commandants' participation.
It aims to help commandants get accustomed to the Earth's environment and secure the safety of each conservation area.
The details will be provided once you get there. The transport of equipment and personnel is ready now.
The integration compilation of the four unnamed records has been completed and the final hidden record has been exported.
This hidden record has unknown network connection performance and signs of data disorder, and reading may cause additional risks.
After all, it is just the record of "others".
If read, it means a connection with "others" would form, resulting in unpredictable consequences.
Even so, will you try to read the final hidden record?
Everyone says today is a special day, but there's no official record of it in my database.
White Day...? This is the first time I've heard of it.
Although I can't fully comprehend the meaning behind this festival, I understand that it's a day you spend with someone you like.
I appreciate that you're willing to spend the day with me, even when it's unrelated to any mission.
You won't have to ask me—I'll always follow you, Commandant, as one of the Gray Ravens.
I'm not particularly perceptive about this, so I wanted to check with you again, Commandant.
Did you want me to visit Venus Splash Park with you because it is White Day today?
Ah, I see... and I thought I was here as a bodyguard.
Regardless, I'm glad that I'm more than just your blade on the battlefield, Commandant, and that I can accompany you on a day like this.
Commandant, thank you for accompanying me on this special day.
I had a really good time. I'll keep this feeling of happiness forever in my M.I.N.D. so that I'll never forget it.
You have always been the person I care... and respect the most, Commandant. It was you who made me understand that I'm more than just a weapon.
I hope that I get to spend every White Day with you like today in the years to come.
*WARNING! The communication channel has been hacked! Please disconnect it immediately!*
Have you been waiting for me to call again?
Even with all those around you, you're still choosing to spend today with me. Do you understand what it implies?
Are you that lonely...? Huh, or were you worried that I'd be alone? Such unfounded concerns.
Stop worrying about these meaningless things. Unlike you, I enjoy my solitude. You should be more concerned about yourself instead of me.
The report on Venus Splash Park's restoration was uploaded to the Science Council. It seems that the Engineering Force hasn't been slacking.

Construction on the essential conservation area settlement is 72.5% complete. Apart from that, repairs on recreational facilities are 45% complete, somehow. I can't say if the Engineering Force is efficient or if there is just a high demand for that kind of facility.
Why are you looking at me like that... Let's be clear—I'm here at the Venus Splash Park with you to collect data. That's all.
Fine... Of course I know what day it is today. As I told you before, festivals are humanity's shared memories. I wouldn't want to miss any of them, essential or not.
Including today. Understand?
Are you going to bed already? That's fair. You've been out having fun the whole day, after all. It's about time you get some rest.
I've just performed maintenance on my frame and cleaned out the salt and sand in my joints.
I told you not to run around on the beach. Had you not dived into the waves, I wouldn't have needed to get you back and...
Your behaviors are giving me a headache… I looked happy? I wasn't... I only went in because I didn't want my commandant washed away by the waves. That's all.
Forget it. You won't listen no matter what I say. It's a special day today, after all, so I'm glad you had fun.
Good night, and... Happy White Day, Commandant.
Commandant, thank you so much for taking me to the Venus Splash Park on White Day...
I'm glad I got to spend time being close to you.
...Sorry, it's... embarrassing to say it out loud.
Commandant, you must be tired now. Please rest up. I'll leave you be.
Happy White Day, Commandant.
Spending today at Venus Splash Park with you... was the best day I've had in quite a while.
I would have spent more time with you, Commandant, but there are only so many hours in a day... It's time for you to rest.
Every moment with you is a miracle for me. I'll keep these memories in my journal.
Commandant, are you going to rest? I'm still unpacking the gifts you gave me today, but I'll be with you shortly.
I didn't want to bother you with unnecessary calls, but there are things I just cannot say in person...
Thank you very much for taking me to the Venus Splash Park on this special day, Commandant. Maybe you didn't realize… but for me, it meant a lot...
I'm almost done with my things. I'll be there soon, Commandant.
Commandant! Happy White Day! Hehe... Of course I know it is White Day today! I knew I had triggered... something important when you came to me!
So you took me to Venus Splash Park because you selected my route? Regardless, my route for you has never changed!
Did you enjoy today, Commandant? Have I picked the best options to increase my Affection?
You seem happy today, Commandant. You haven't stopped laughing... Because of me? I told you I'd keep smiling for you as long as you like.
Did you take me to Venus Splash Park today to cheer me up? Here I thought it was because it's White Day today... Ah! You must know what it is, Commandant!
See, you know it... So can I call it a date? It was a date! Crap—now I have to play a few rounds of fighting games to calm down! Yep! Sounds good! Good night, Commandant!
I'm not inviting you to my room to play with me. You are not staying overnight! Why? Because I want to wake up early and see you well-rested and energized!
Commandant, the female members of the force just reminded me that it is a special day today.
I'm sorry I didn't realize what day it was. I was wondering why you invited me to Venus Splash Park with you.
No, you didn't keep away from any of my work. I finished them in advance in order to join you. I should thank you for having me.
White Day... I've been told it's connected to Valentine's Day. How are they connected?
Please tell me more if you don't mind. I would love to keep listening to you talk, Commandant.
White Day...? No, I didn't know about it.
I only learned about Valentine's Day from the database not too long ago, so I wasn't expecting a day for people to reciprocate a month later. So this is what it's for... Good. I get it now.
Offensive? No, it's not offensive. It may not be my idea of a traditional festival, but the meaning of a festival has always been given by the people who celebrate it.
The important thing is how people view it now. The time I spent with you today has been fulfilling and endearing, and that's good enough.
Hey! What took you so long to answer?! Were you drifting off?!
Answer my call immediately next time, do you hear me?! Don't make me wait! What? You're tired?
Tch! Turns out the Gray Raven Commandant is so weak and puny. We only walked around Venus Splash Park today, and you're already exhausted?
...Tch. Then get your *** to bed already... What?! I wasn't worried! I—WAS—NOT!
But now that you've answered my call... Happy... White... Day. What?! **** you! I thought that was what... Whatever! Get out of here!
